attributes.action: campaign to change the law on spent convictions
attributes.additional_details:
My aim is to along with as many people as possible campaign for the change in the law in connection with Spent Convictions,,
A Spent Conviction for a crime involving a weapon should never be classed as spent,
This convictions should not be excluded from any other sentence given for a simular crime purely because its classed as spent,
We require the law on this to be changed,
